object.name: transferBusinessAccountStars
object.description: Transfers Telegram Stars from the business account balance to the bot's balance. Requires the can_transfer_stars business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Transfers Telegram Stars from the business account balance to the bot's balance. Requires the can_transfer_stars business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Transfers Telegram Stars from the business account balance to the bot's balance. Requires the *can_transfer_stars* business bot right. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Number of Telegram Stars to transfer; 1-10000
annotations.rst_description: Number of Telegram Stars to transfer; 1-10000
annotations.name: star_count
